Этот Биошок не похож на первый или второй,тут нет такой дикой атмосферности.Чувствуется нотка душевности от авторов,видно что над игрой долго-долго старались,когда ты впервые видишь этот мир с голубым небом,парящими домами,добрыми жителями,то тебе хочется ходить по нему,изучать его,даже завести с кем-то диалог.Когда понимаешь суть сюжета,то тебе хочется уже быстро пробежать уровни,и посмотреть,что в конце-концов случилось,а случилось довольно странное...

Сложная игра,в психологическом плане,сюжет есть,и если его понять,то можно очень долго сидеть и думать,а почему так,а вот здесь почему.

Awesome Story :)
Der Beste SinglePlayer, den ich je gespielt habe.

Simplesmente o game com enredo mais original e surpreendente do ano de 2013!
Um jogo fantástico que te gruda do começo ao fim, com um final de cair o queixo!
Recomendadissimo !
Jogo muito bom, recomendo que compre o 1 e o 2 Bioshock para entender a história e depois as DLCs do Infinite vale a pena, única coisa de ruim é que um jogão desses não é online uma pena mesmo :(

Acabei de zerar e digo que BioShock Infinite não é um jogo apenas para ser jogado, mas para se contemplar, observar cada detalhe.

Realmente é uma obra incrível e com tudo que um game precisa para ser realmente bom - história cativante, personagens misteriosos, reviravoltas na trama e um final que o faz ficar estático, pensando em cada detalhe e na genialidade da história do game por um bom tempo, mesmo depois de o ter zerado.

É bom ver que ainda existem games que prezam por uma boa história e não apenas em sangue e mutilação "gratuita".

Certamente um jogo que ficará gravado na mente de quem já o jogou.

This is my first experience with a Bioshock game and I absolutely loved it. One of my most favorite games of all time. I just finished my second playthrough and I high encourage everyone to play through multiple times at a relatively slow pace. This game is just too wonderful to speed through. I can't wait to see what the second Burial at Sea episode brings either. 
An amazing game that I HIGHLY recommend.

Если вы очень внимательно следили за сюжетом оригинала, но так ничего и не поняли. То Burial at Sea поможет вам разобратся что к чему. А любителям оригинальной дилогии наступят на ностальгию )

On your first play through you are left pleased and wanting more with the dialog being meaningful but you don't see the real purpose to everything even a simple "sorry" means something! on the second playthough everything makes sense and the same word "sorry" you begin to understand! 

To ensure no spoilers there is no actual full on detailed description. Play it for yourselfs and enjoy!

don't buy inot all of the "reviews" of this game that say its the best game ever. yes, it is a pretty good game, and maybe the best hallway shooter that i've ever played. the AI is kinda derp, especially Elizabeth, not very many of the vigors and weapons were fun to use, the story was meh at best, and all in all it was an ok game to waste a couple hours on. Don't buy it because of the hype, don't buy it cause you want a nother bioshock game (which this doesn't really feel like), buy it because you don't have anything better to do.

재미있는 게임이다. 하지만 전작과의 비교는 피할 수 없을듯하다. 게임플레이와 게임상의 공간이 스토리와 어긋나는 느낌을 계속 받았는데,  기본적으로 전작들의 기본 몹들인 스플라이서와 인피니티의 몹은 스토리에 기여하는 바가 확연하게 틀리기 때문이다. 

게임이 재미있냐고 묻는다면, 예스라고 답할것이지만.  전작보다 재미있냐고 묻는다면 그렇지 않다고 답할것이다.

First of all I would like to say I completed this game on ps3 and bought it on pc to play the dlc which was 75% off the season pass. So my playtime is that of burial at sea episode 1.

Bioshock throws you into a floating world in the sky named Columbia which has great character and atmosphere to it, it's not a scary game but irrational ( the developers ) have created a well realised world and game area for you to enjoy.

There has been a lot of critiscm over the gameplay and although it is not amazing I personally think it is solid and fun especially with sky hooks which allow you to use them as vantage points to hit enemies from and get from point to point.

Elizabeth is a great character full of life and energy and seems innocent and skeptical of you as you see her grow as a character.

The story for me was confuesing at times and the ending I couldn't quite understand which was a disapointment (It's not just me being stupid there are dedicated articles and long professional youtube videos explaining it) however saying that once I knew everything I thought it was sensational and it all made sense. Some of the story in the middle section of the game can be a bit boring to be honest but I still found the game enjoyable enough to continue on despite this.

Overall I think it's an amazing game what irrational planned they have beautifully exucuted with no cutscenes, QTE events as you the player are a part of the game throughout. A superb game.

Greatness is either accepted or denied. BioShock is simply exceptional in every aspect. Regardless of what you may read elsewhere, this game is simply fantastic and you shouldn't let reviewers who allow themselves to get caught up in overanalyzing whether every single narrative point makes perfect sense or not. The game is beautiful, original, well-thought out and I even tought the gameplay (which many people reviewed negatively for some reason) worked exactly as designed. For all these reason, you should absolutely play this game. You will not regret it. Once you pick it up, you won't want to put it down. Simple as that.

Awesome gameplay, stunning visuals, good story, and epic ending.

I would give it a 10/10, but the game is too stingy when it comes to money. You can search every single nook and cranny in the entire game, yet only just barely scrounge up enough money to fully upgrade every single ability and maybe 2-3 weapons. I don't mind having to specialize my character, but having to scrounge around so much just to get those few upgrades was getting annoying by the time it was all over. Also the fact the game takes money away from you when you die was like a kick in the balls.

This game offers a mind-bending and mind-blowing story. Overall the game was great and provided an amazing expirience. But keep in mind that in the end it does get tricky to understand and you have to really pay attention to understand the whole story.

Самая лучшая игра из тех, в которые я играл последние два года. Вы просто обязаны поиграть в нее. Очень яркий сюжет, насыщенная графика на движке Unreal Engine, красочные персонажи и полуоголенные сиськи.

Игра, которую сложно назвать игрой. Это самое настоящее произведение искусства. Невероятный сеттинг, в который погружаешься с головой и проживаешь всю историю на одном дыхании. Сюжет, который каждую главу подкидывает новых палок в огонь воображения, не давая потухнуть твоему интересу. В этой игре главное не просто пробежать и перестрелть всех врагов, главное - созерцать и видеть мелочи, в которых скрыт смысл. И тогда в конце вы поймете, что отличает эту игру, что делает ее особенной и уникальной.

Score: 10
Played: ~20hours, finishing the main story and most challenges
+ The world holds incredible value towards the story, gameplay and immersion
+ Enormously satisfying plot
+ Combination of Guns and Vigors allows for gameplay variation and keeps it interesting
+ All characters have such terrific characterizations and personalities
+ Currency is scarce, so upgrading abilities and weapons feels very rewarding
 - You can only hold on to two weapons/vigors, which ultimately causes you to stick to a certain combination and stop trying out new weapons and abilities
 - Even collecting all the money available, you can't buy all upgrades for weapons and abilities. Although this is not a bad design per se, new players tend to find out later in the game they picked the wrong upgrades with no way of undoing it

Overall an excellent game, great storyline, interesting characters, and a good plot. The only problem that I have with the game is that it has a linear gameplay style, as compared to a open-world. This would have been hard with the storyline, however they could have made a bit more "roadside attractions". 10/10 for story, 8/10 for gameplay and 9/10 for graphics.

les graphismes sont superbes aussi.

Tentative recommend.  I actually didn't enjoy this game as much as the original Bioshock.  Why?

I think in part it has to do with the fact that Infinite feels like it's more story than gameplay.  The gameplay isn't bad.  It just doesn't feel inspired.  Bioshock 1 & 2 had about a dozen powers and a lot of sub-powers you could configure, plus hacking/stealth aspect.   Infinite drops all of that and gives you six main powers, and about two dozen or so sub-powers which can only fit in four slots.  All in all, it just felt rather simple, even with the ability to ride sky-rails, and it didn't hold my interest.

The checkpoint system was rather annoying, and the loss of cash on dying should have been a hard-mode option only.  I particularly loathed the fact that the game put me in this fun looking sky-city world -- and then punished me if I decided to take a leap off a ledge and see what was there.  Psst:  Developers, I would never have this complaint if you implemented a true save/load mechanism.

The story and visuals are top notch.  But this game feels like a Hollywood blockbuster to me;  All style, little substance.

Despite that:  The world of Columbia didn't feel as real to me as Rapture.  Rapture was a disintegrating utopia filled with criminals driven insane by their mad desire for perfection.  A world of gibbering splicers running amongst the feet of prowling Big Daddies.  It was a circus nightmare and you were thrust into the middle of it.

But Columbia?  It was a nice, ideallyic 1950s American dream (yes, including the blatant racism).  And then you come in and tear it all down.  Because of that, I didn't feel sympathy for the protagionist.  I guess the devs were hoping for a "YEAH SHOW THOSE RACIST ASSHOLES, GO IN THERE AND SMASH THEIR FACES IN!" vibe, but honestly I find that far less interesting than entering a world already driven mad by its corrupt philosophy, as was seen in Rapture.  I want to see Columbia fail on its own, because of its terrible premise.  I don't want to actually be the cause of that failure.
This game is absolutely beautiful.  One of the most gripping and immersive games I have ever played. 5/5

Quelle blague ! amateurs du premier opus passés votre chemin ... Mis a part la réalisation technique qui est a son parosysme au début du jeu, il n y a rien.

L'esprit de bioshock n'est plus. Il se transforme assez rapidement en un FPS classique ou l'on enchaîne des hordes d'ennemis. L'histoire est totalement incohérente et tend vers le ridicule à la fin ... . Au point où on a l'impression qu'ils ont ajouté des trames petit à petit afin de faire durer le jeu ... .

also mir gefällt das game. habe mit begeisterung und ausdauer Bioshock 1 und 2 durchgespielt. im direkten vergleich ist es aus meiner sicht eine subtile evolution des spielprinzips. was den flow ausmacht ist, daß es keine mega unmöglichen stellen gibt. die endgegner sind knackig aber man hat immer das gefühl es irgendwie schaffen zu können. man hat einfach ziemlich viele möglichkeiten seine waffen und fähigkeiten zu kombinieren. es muß natürlich ordentlcih geübt werden um eine sinnvolle strategie umsetzen zu können.
für fans der ersten beiden teile: einfach zugreifen ;)

As a game, BioShock: Infinite is okay.  The level design never wowed me as places for interesting combat, even if there were lots of good ideas.  On the other hand, I thought the setting was interesting and unusual, and the story was decent.  It was a decent way to kill a few hours.  To avoid getting bogged down in the gameplay, which didn't thrill me, started over on easy and played that way.  This left absolutely no challenge (I never died) but that didn't bother me.
Beautiful game, easier than previous installments in the series and the combat doesn't feel as good as Bioshock 1. The story and setting carry the game though.
çok eğlenceli bir oyun

Bioshock Infinite started out a great and incredibly beautiful, but after many hours it started dragging out for far too long. Combat turned from fun to an empty, churny and uninspired chore between story crumbs. It felt like the team lost track of "fun" 70% or so into the game. As such, the promise the game made with its fantastic first hours turned out to be a huge lie towards the end. The many [i]many[/i] faults with the nimble-as-a-refridgerator controls were at first totally forgivable, but when everything but the visuals crumbled and came tumbling down around it, the painful dance with those blaring faults were pretty much all that was left. The payoff the game convinced me it could deliver was just reduced to a dirty rag tossed to the side.

Playing on hard can be a real challenge towards the end, but I find that most of my deaths through the game came from getting stuck in basic geometry, the character not running, or simply not jumping to the various hook-spots when he was supposed to. Bioshock Infinite is also a perfect reminder of why enemies using hit-scan weapons in shooters just aren't [i]fun[/i].

I will try to beat it as I'm most probably just one small hill from the end, just to get it over with, and certainly not because I find it entertaining anymore. I'm actually even rather uninterested by the story at this point, as all the characters decided to just muddle up their believability with just stupid and inconsistent behavior.

It honestly feels like the original team of the game were not, at all, the same people who made the latter hours of it. Weird. Disappointing.

[i]I really wanted to recommend this. I was looking forward to finishing it so I could look up the DLC. I had it in my list of favorites. But I can't recommend it anymore. And I will certainly not touch the DLC.[/i]

Before playing this game I had never played any Bioshock or had no idea what it was about. This game was my favorite game of the year. Beautiful Graphics that make the whole city in the sky just more enjoyable. Amazing story line. Everytime you thought you had understood what was going on there would be a huge plot twist making you want to continue. I loved the theme of the whole game. Unlike every modern game this had quite a nice old fell to the game.  Would defenitly reccomend getting it.
Best game ever!
The game has very involuted and intriguing story, this should be interesting for time travel film fans.

BioShock Infinite is definitely one of the better shooters I've played in recent memory.  The story is original and full of plot twists and action, and the ability to use both powers and weapons without switching between the two is a refreshing change from the earlier entries to the series.  In addition to this your companion is actually the most useful companion I've seen in quite some time.  She frequently saved me during combat, providing me with items that would restore my salts, health, or ammo, and would also throw me coins outside combat.  

I did feel there were a couple points right at the end that were a little bit less refined than the rest of the combat in the game, and I felt like there were also a few points during the story that felt like the writers were maybe trying a little too hard to impress people with their creativity, but all in all this is an excellent game that you should definitely try.

The story was incredibly impressive in the last 20-30 minutes of game play. The action/game play itself wasn't incredibly exciting. The spawns and waves seemed a bit predictable and the dispatching of different types of enemies wasn't very difficult to manage. You could kill most enemies in the same two or three ways. A lot of shooting, not really very much strategy at all. But it was definitely enjoyable.

And again, the way that wrapped the story up was great, epic. I don't think I'll go back for more than one play through, but it's well worth the money.

Про сам игровой процесс:
Перестрелки местами бывают однообразны, на протяжении нескльких глав одни и те же враги, со времемем становится более интересней при появлении новых, причем довольно сложных . Радует что в этой игре мало локаций подобных друг другу, дает разнообразность игре.

It will blow your mind, no doubt. I totally recommend it after playing Bioshock 1 and 2.

Ухх... Знаете, я хотел написать небольшую рецензию по поводу прохождения BioShock Infinite, но впечатлений настолько много, что они не укладываются у меня в короткую заметку. Даже не знаю с чего начать...

Понравилась? Yes, of course, my prophet!.. В последнее время особо ничем не удивить - штампуют шутер за шутером, а кроме стрельбы и стрельбы, а также стрельбы там ничего больше нет. Хм.. И тут вы скажете: "Но ведь и тут надо стрелять, стрелять и стрелять!?"... Да, - вы будете правы, но до того времени, пока не пройдете игру. Это больше похоже на произведение искусства и ни на что больше. Я могу сравнить это с картиной на выставке. Когда вы каждый новый раз осматриваете её, и начинаете обнаруживать мелкие детали, которые художник мастерски скрыл от зрителя. Именно так игра предстает перед нами. При первом прохождении зритель захватывает только основные детали - мы не смотрим на мелочи, которые на самом деле играют удивительно важную роль. И вот завязка - "Как? Почему? Может быть я упустил какую-то деталь или переменную в сюжете?" - и уверяю вас, новое прохождение покажет уже совсем другую картину - картину, на которой вы можете обнаружите совершенно новые детали.

Игровая и сюжетная составляющие, находятся в некоем "золотом сечении". Не затянули, ни сократили. Я могу провести аналогию с фильмами "Начало" и "Остров проклятых". Смешайте эти две составляющие, добавьте "соли" по вкусу, и получите примерный аналог сюжета игры. Загадки любят все?.. Я не буду вдаваться в глубь сюжетной линии, но именно благодаря ей появилась прекрасная девушка-компаньон Элизабет, которая знает мир только со стороны добра и не знает, что он может быть другим. "Ой, Буккер, смотри - золото!, - Если это золото, то я король Англии".

Можно отдельно отметить графическую составляющую и дизайн уровней. Приятно осознавать, что среди нас еще остались такие талантливые художники и дизайнеры. Город - игрушка. Наверно, если бы мне сказали выбери любое место, где ты бы хотел оказаться в живую - я бы на втором месте выбрал Колумбию. А о первом месте я не скажу. :) Иногда даже не хочется стрелять и проливать кровь в таком месте - жаль, что разработчики не предусмотрели "тихое" прохождение. Хотя, это бы не уложилось в данный сюжет, да и вообще в концепцию серии.

BioShok Infinite поднимает планку "умных" игр до нового уровня. Это уже не "тупые" скрипты, а полное погружение игрока в судьбу персонажа. Это некий обряд очищения, пройдя который, вы взгляните на шутеры по-новому.

Играть?.. Несомненно. Даже если вы не любитель современного искусства. Моя оценка: 10/10.
El mejor de la saga, ambientación, luces, gráficos, personajes... lo tiene todo *-*
Amazing Game !
best game ever!!!!!!!
